page.title: 18Memories-A Thorpe Resident
page.content: We went to talk to a 91 year old lady, the great grandmother of a boy at {Todwick School}who lives in{Thorpe {Salvin,}to ask about the changes she's seen in her lifetime and during the 70 years she has lived in the village. She remembers changes to{Thorpe {Salvin Hall}which was a ruined house of Elizabeth I time. New stables have been built and much of the remains of the ruins are being preserved. She has noticed a great increase in the number of{cars}which pass her house,which is on the main road to{Steetley}and {Shireoaks,}although the{buses}do not bother her as they use a different route. An{electricity supply}was connected when she was moved in to her present house 30 years ago and she does not quite remember when the {television}arrived, but it was around { continued....
